member.summary: Class containing static identifiers describing rights.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsDevce
member.summary: Rights granted to every device connected to a Mesh. These are currently limited to the ability to read the network and application catalogs, both of which will require additional grants to be of use.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsService
member.summary: Rights granted to a named service device

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsMessage
member.summary: Rights granted to a device afforded external messaging capabilities in addition to those of a connected device. These add the right to read/update the contacts and publications catalogs, to read the inbound spool and read/write to the outbound spool and to sign and decrypt messages under the public credentials for the account.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsWeb
member.summary: Rights granted a device afforded Web access in addition to external messaging. These add the right to read/update the credential, calendar and bookmark catalogs.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsDeveloper
member.summary: Rights granted a device afforded Web access in addition to external messaging. These add the right to read/update the credential, calendar and bookmark catalogs.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsSSH
member.summary: Rights granted an SSH client device. This is limited to access to an SSH authenticator under the account. Which may be a device specific key plus a credential or the account key.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsPgp
member.summary: Rights granted to a PGP enabled device. This requires external messaging and the ability to sign/decrypt messages under the PGP keying.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsSmime
member.summary: Rights granted to an S/MIME enabled device. This requires external messaging and the ability to sign/decrypt messages under the S/MIME keying.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsGroupAdministrator
member.summary: Rights granted to a group administrator. An administrator can add users to the group but does not automatically gain the ability to access group materials themselves.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsGroupMember
member.summary: Rights granted to a group member. A group member can read/update the group publications catalog and decrypt data encrypted under the group key.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsGrantThreashold
member.summary: Rights granted a device afforded Web access in addition to external messaging. These add the right to read/update the credential, calendar and bookmark catalogs.

member.summary: Constructor, returns an enumerator on the sequence , starting with the frame numbered . If is true, results are returned from the last match first.
member.param: The sequence to enumerate.
The starting point for the enumeration. If it matches, this will be the first result returned.
If true, return results in the reverse order.
If not null, specifies a filtering function on the store entries.
